issue.title: [C++] Pluggable statistics collector API for unconvertible CSV values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to be able to collect statistics (e.g. distinct value counts) about values in a column of a CSV file that cannot be converted to a desired data type. 

When conversion fails, the converters can call into an abstract API like

```Java

statistics_->CannotConvert(token, size);
```

or something similar
